body:
Eduardo,

Natural ventilation should not have a significant effect on your daylight simulations but you can find an example for how to integrate it into your Energy simulations here:

[http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=chriswmackey&for...](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=chriswmackey&fork=hydra_2&id=Natural_Ventilation)

-Chris
